title: The Future of Web Development: Trends You Should Know
details: Explore how modern frameworks, performance optimizations, and accessibility standards are shaping the future of web development.

title: Mastering JavaScript: From Fundamentals to Advanced
details: This guide walks you through JavaScript essentials — variables, functions, objects — and dives into ES6+ features and async programming.

title: Why React Remains a Developer Favorite in 2025
details: React’s component-based architecture, hooks, and large ecosystem make it the go-to choice for building scalable UI in modern applications.

title: Top 10 Free Resources to Learn Web Development
details: From documentation to interactive platforms, discover the best free tools and websites to kickstart your journey into web development.
